Html:
Hello

i've a problem and no solution for it.

My wish is to add several markers on map(simple rectangels with alpha value max 100) that i can still see the map. But the markers overlapp sometimes and on this area i can't see the map.

Does anyone has a solution?

1. check if markers cut each other and create one complex marker is very difficult.

2. add a maximum alpha value to this layer, could be help but i have no idea how to implement.

thank for some tips

bye EDE
you mean few overlapping markers almost lose transparency to background? ..clustering markers would help, but so far i have zero coding on this..

http://www.bilder-space.de/show_img.php?img=533ccf-1348657120.png&size=original

clustering wouldn't help. i want all those rectangels but the maximum alpha value should be variable, that the map is still visible.
